attributes.action: Repeal the European Communities Act 1972 to regain full control of our borders.
attributes.additional_details:
Ask Nigel Farage or anyone who understands the subversive nature of this act.  Watch these Videos 
Britain on the Brink Sir Patrick Moore
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GfcRmyW5Cx0&spfreload=10

The real face of the European UNION
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cBo7Ug_1M8k

Long version the truth about the European Union
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QFevdq4wZRw
attributes.background: The European Communities Act 1972 is the act of parliament that gives the consent to EU laws and subverts our sovereignty.  We have been lied to and conned by successive governments and the original referendum was a fraud on the people of the United Kingdom. Sign this and use social media to spread.
